effect.x_y: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.

short_effect.x_y: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.

flavor_text.x_y: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
